column1: The '''Hill of Guard''' or '''Amon Tirith''' was the outlying hill on which [[Minas Tirith]] was build. It joined [[Mindolluin]] by a narrow shoulder which rose to the height of the fifth wall of the city.<ref>{{RK
''Amon Tirith'' is the [[Sindarin]] rendition of "hill of guard" (see ''[[amon]]'' and ''[[tirith]]'').<ref name=Nomen>{{HM
